channel.title: ietf on Today I Learned
channel.description: Recent content in ietf on Today I Learned

item.description: RFCs are labeled with different statuses: Internet Standard (e.g. HTTP/1.1) Proposed Standard (e.g. HTTP/3, HTTP/2) Best Current Practice Experimental Informational Historic […] RFCs usually begin as Internet-Drafts (I-Ds) written by an individual or a small group. In the IETF, these are then usually adopted by a working group, and improved and revised. – https://www.ietf.org/standards/rfcs/
